Name: Reinforcements
Description: Playing multiple cards from the same faction adds +1 attack per matching card in play.

Name: Casimir Shield
Description: Half your hand's attack value becomes a shield.

Name: Central Starbase
Description: Every Machine Transcendence card in play adds +1 trade point.

Name: Charybdis Quasar
Description: Regain +1 health points at the beginning of every turn.

Name: Compression Shield
Description: All your bases have +2 defense.

Name: Consumption
Description: You may thin out your deck by permanently removing one unplayed card from your hand each turn.

Name: Cosmic Slime
Description: When reshuffling your deck, you may place any two of your cards on top of your deck.

Name: Fleet Action
Description: You may forfeit all trade points to convert half of them to attack points.

Name: Galactic Iris
Description: Every one of your bases in play adds +1 attack.

Name: Gibson Mainframe
Description: Every Machine Transcendence card in play adds +1 attack point.

Name: Headache Projection
Description: Every Psi Hive card in play adds +1 attack point.

Name: Mineral Deposit
Description: Each of your bases produces +1 trade.

Name: Mulligan's Anomaly
Description: Shuffle the trade row back into the deck and redeal.

Name: Orbital Mechanics
Description: Every Trade Collective card in play adds +1 attack point.

Name: Planet Killer
Description: Start every turn with +2 attack points.

Name: Prescience
Description: Every Psi Hive card in play adds +1 trade point.

Name: Quantitative Easing
Description: Every Trade Collective card in play adds +1 trade point.

Name: Quantum Foam
Description: You may forfeit all attack points to convert half of them to trade points.

Name: Radical Radar
Description: Your opponent must play open handed for the duration of the game.

Name: Religious Fervor
Description: Every Purity card in play adds +1 attack point.

Name: Solar Swap
Description: Discard any card from your current hand and draw a new one.

Name: Ablation
Description: Your opponent's bases' offer -2 defense.

Name: Spice Melange
Description: Start every turn with +2 trade points.

Name: Star Gate
Description: Draw an extra card every turn.

Name: Starfall
Description: Every Purity card in play adds +1 trade point.

Name: Stellar Co-op
Description: Playing multiple cards from the same faction adds +1 trade per matching card in play.

Name: Subspace Vortex
Description: Each base in play, yours or your opponents, offers +1 trade.

Name: Buffered Teleport
Description: Swap any card from your current hand with a card drawn at random from your opponent's hand.

Name: Abundant Discipline
Description: Starship Troopers now offer +1 attack.

Name: Moebius Manifold
Description: Merchants now offer +1 trade.
